    Publications

    • SA-LOAM: Semantic-aided LiDAR SLAM with Loop Closure

      L. Li, X. Kong, X. Zhao, W. Li, F. Wen, H. Zhang, and Y. Liu. "SA-LOAM: Semantic-aided LiDAR SLAM with Loop Closure," 2021 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), 2021, pp. 7627–7634.

    • SSC: Semantic Scan Context for Large-Scale Place Recognition

      L. Li, X. Kong, X. Zhao, T. Huang, W. Li, F. Wen, H. Zhang, and Y. Liu, “SSC: Semantic scan context for large-scale place recognition,” 2021 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS), 2021, pp. 2092-2099.

    • Semantic scan context: a novel semantic-based loop-closure method for LiDAR SLAM

      Li, L., Kong, X., Zhao, X. et al. Semantic scan context: a novel semantic-based loop-closure method for LiDAR SLAM. Auton Robot 46, 535–551 (2022).

    • RINet: Efficient 3D Lidar-Based Place Recognition Using Rotation Invariant Neural Network

      L. Li, X. Kong, X. Zhao, T. Huang, W. Li, F. Wen, H. Zhang, and Y. Liu, "RINet: Efficient 3D Lidar-Based Place Recognition Using Rotation Invariant Neural Network," in IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters, vol. 7, no. 2, pp. 4321-4328, April 2022.
